segments.text: Excuse me , could you tell me the bookshop ’ s address ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the bookshop is just around the corner.Turn left and you ’ ll see the bookshop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much.By the way , is the hospital beside the bookshop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right , if you see the bookshop , you can see the hospital .
segments.speaker: S2
